title: The Princess Switch: Switched Again
description: When Duchess Margaret unexpectedly inherits the throne & hits a rough patch with Kevin, it’s up to Stacy to save the day before a new lookalike — party girl Fiona — foils their plans.

reviews.text: If you saw the first one, and obviously I think it will be the case for most people, then you know very well what kind of generic story you will see, and therefore there won't be any surprises, but just more of the same.The quality may not be completely disposable, but that's far from being a compliment considering what it offers and those who hope to enjoy it.

The sequel of 1 is a bit disappointing because f the mashup  of roles and you cant easily know who is  who. There are some scenes after the switch I was really knot knowing whois who  . Fiona  is the best among the characters  with the very sexy silhouette and her funny gang members Vanessa again rocks with the three distinct characters she plays
